text.div:
StructureDefinitionKind

Defines the type of structure that a definition is describing.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/structure-definition-kind defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
primitive-type Primitive Data TypeA data type, which is a primitive type that has a value and an extension. These can be used throughout Resource and extension definitions. Only tbe base specification can define primitive types.
complex-type Complex Data TypeA data type - either a complex structure that defines a set of data elements. These can be used throughout Resource and extension definitions, and in logical models.
resource ResourceA resource defined by the FHIR specification.
logical Logical ModelA logical model - a conceptual package of data that will be mapped to resources for implementation.

name: StructureDefinitionKind
description: Defines the type of structure that a definition is describing.

concept.definition: A data type, which is a primitive type that has a value and an extension. These can be used throughout Resource and extension definitions. Only tbe base specification can define primitive types.
A data type - either a complex structure that defines a set of data elements. These can be used throughout Resource and extension definitions, and in logical models.
A resource defined by the FHIR specification.
A logical model - a conceptual package of data that will be mapped to resources for implementation.
